text:
Yes and that is where we're at... Which is fine for 1 email. But we're trying to transfer batches or multiple emails at a time.

We were using reference paths with the modules, so the emails + templates + modules + styling are all transferring. But the end user is still left to do some manual mapping b/c of some API limitations. Definitely frustrating.

Appreciate your help! And if you think of anything, would love to hear it.
